Brand Colours

Supporting Colours

Seasonal or secondary colour set. Will be reproduced for every season or promotion event with a new set of colours.

Typography

Body Copy

Bootstrap's global default font-size is 14px, with a line-height of 20px. This is applied to the <body> and all paragraphs. In addition, <p> (paragraphs) receive a bottom margin of half their line-height (10px by default).

Primary Font

Helvetica Neue

Navigation

Navbar (6-components/_c-navbar.scss)

Navbars are static (not fixed to the top) and include support for a project name and basic navigation. Place one anywhere within a .container, which sets the width of your site and content.

Tabs & Pills (..)

Tabs and pills are horizontal by default, just add a second class, .nav-stacked, to make them appear vertically stacked.

tabs & pills go here

Pagination (..)

Simple pagination inspired by Rdio, great for apps and search results.
